a0.speaker: Kaori:
a0.dialogue: Urf... Before her body went all weird when the curse is in effect, you gave me a pat on the face!

a2.speaker: Youmu:
a2.dialogue: Even if you can multiply a ham sandwich that can feed the entire world, I am sure nobody is going to eat all of those.

a3.speaker: Kaori:
a3.dialogue: Why do ham sandwiches above everything? Are you trying to make a total fool out of me?
